Text: ScheduleDon Per our phone conversation last night according to the August schedule Im scheduled to work the night of Fri th and Sat th As mentioned a few weeks ago I have signed up to attend a Sunday school retreat that weekend Ive actually been ask to speak Fri night and would really like to do all I can to attend Currently we have guys scheduled to work Sat night so my absence shouldnt be a big deal however Fridays schedule just has me and Mauricio theres currently no ERCOT guy scheduled so if that changes my problem is solved I attempted to work out a trade with a few guys with no success Maybe even Brant Reves can be scheduled that night if no ERCOT is penciled in Anything we could work out would be GREATLY appreciated even if I have to give up vacation time its not a problem As for the GMAT and graduate school reimbursement we discussed I was told to contact my Business Unit Mgr for the necessary info As you know Enron must sponsor my application into UHs Executive MBA program so any guidance you can provide me with is appreciated One last thing I currently hold a NASD Series licenses These licenses need to be housed with Enron to prevent them from expireing Who would I contact about housing them here Thanks for all you help Don Sincerely Andrew

RE Please include PJM EAST HUB on Shift Note Cc Don How possible would it be to let me have the weekend of August th off According to the current August schedule I am working that weekend would it be easier for me to try to arrange a swap with a co worker Thanks Andrew Original Message From Baughman Jr Don Sent Wednesday July PM To Blaine Jay Collins Dustin Errigo Joe Garcia Miguel L Greer Andrew Hernandez Juan Kinser John Laurent Dean Makkai Peter Olinde Jr Steve Padron Juan Rogers Benjamin Stepenovitch Joe Trejo Reese Watts Christopher Subject Please include PJM EAST HUB on Shift Note Compadres Please include PJM EAST HUB on the Shift Note include Onpeak Offpeak and Allday averages The NE boys tell me that the same values are available on the PJM Summary page If you have any questions drop me line or call Thank you Don Cell

Credit JobsDon I handed you little brothers res over to Molly Harris Molly is a Dir in the Credit Risk Management department of RAC currently my boss and is looking to bring on at least new people Molly reports to Bill Bradford and I know Bill is looking for other people in lue of the Molly needs I will give Bill a copy of Traviss res as well Also you can reference Job s and on Enrons job board for descriptions of Credit Risk Management openings I hope this helps Andrew

REBlack dot is what I would need The two concerns I have is shaft flex I would actually prefer steel shafts and the price Im broke I appreciate your willingness to work with me but even though your price is fair I simply cant afford it Let me know how much you would be willing to come off but I have to warn you even if you ask it would be hard for me to come up with Thanks again for keeping me in mind Drew Original Message From Ring Richard Sent Monday September AM To Greer Andrew Subject RE The Ping Is are black dot New Ping Is with steel shafts are and used Ping Is are If you have any interest at all I would be willing to work with you on price andor payment terms Original Message From Greer Andrew Sent Saturday September AM To Ring Richard Subject RE Thanks for the heads up Are they black dot Even if they are I much prefer steel shafts mainly because Im poor Thanks for offer and keep me in the loop for other ping I or Callaway X Original Message From Ring Richard Sent Friday September AM To Greer Andrew Subject RE Andrew Ping I oversize graphite shaft reqular flex The regular flex in Ping graphite shafts are pretty firm I have thru pw all in excellent condition If you have any interest we can talk about the price but my first inclination is that the price would be similar to the price for a new set of Ping I oversize steel shaft approx Richard Original Message From Greer Andrew Sent Thursday September PM To Ring Richard Subject RE No Whats you got Original Message From Ring Richard Sent Thursday September AM To Greer Andrew Subject Andrew Did you purchase any new golf clubs yet I may have something that you are interested in Let me know Richard

NYMEX SwapsDana Just wanted to send you a summary of the Nov SWAPS I sold for you last night Sold Sold Sold for a total of sold The bid stayed between and the rest of the night so I didnt sell the last Thanks for giving me the opportunity to work with EOL Be sure to keep me in mind if you need a night time trader ha Sincerely Andrew Greer PS Check out Galatians when you get the chance
